snippet.title: Closer the Distance - Announcement Trailer [ID@Xbox]
snippet.description:
From Osmotic Studios and Skybound Games, Closer the Distance is a deeply moving slice-of-life sim that tells a story about the connections between family and friends in the face of tragedy. Following a fatal car accident, players take on the role of Angela, a young girl from the town of Yesterby, who finds herself watching over her loved ones as they navigate the grieving process. Using her ethereal ability to influence the townspeople she once knew, Angela’s choices will ultimately determine the fate of Yesterby.
#idatxbox #idxbox #id_xbox
